Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.util.log

Interface Summary
Logger The Logger provides a generic logging API.
LoggerController A controller for a single Logger, used to set the logging levels and output destinations (console, files, etc).
 

Class Summary
LoggerAdapter Standard implementation of all the busy-work of Logger
LoggerControllerProxy This class simply wraps a LoggerController and proxies it.
LoggerFactory Factory to create Logger and LoggerController instances.
LoggerProxy This class simply wraps a Logger and proxies it.
LoggerWithPrefix A Logger wrapper that adds a prefix to all logging messages.
Logging Static access to simple logging facilities.
LogTarget Represents an output destination of a named logger.
NullLogger Logger where all "is*()" methods return false, and all "log()" methods are ignored.
NullLoggerFactory No-op LoggerFactory to connect to NullLogger instances.
